title: OVHcloud Enables Kubernetes Cluster Management at Scale
author: Meredith Shubel
description: At KubeCon Paris 2024, OVHcloud will unveil Managed Rancher Service and Data Platform to help simplify K8s orchestration and data management.
cntitle: OVHcloud 启用大规模 Kubernetes 集群管理
cndescription: 在 2024 年巴黎 KubeCon 上，OVHcloud 将推出托管 Rancher 服务和数据平台，以帮助简化 K8s 编排和数据管理。
